regen.absent_element: warning or notification for project deletion
regen.new_specification: The system shall alert the user before deleting a project to confirm the deletion and ensure no critical work items are lost.

regen.absent_element: warning for unsuccessful project creation or edit operations
regen.new_specification: The system shall alert the user if a project cannot be created or edited due to invalid information or other errors.

regen.absent_element: validation of project information before creation or editing
regen.new_specification: The system shall validate project information for completeness and consistency before creating or editing a project.

label: The user shall be able to combine multiple projects into a master project.
absence: action of combining multiple projects into a master project
